org.hibernate.search.hcore.util.impl

Class ContextHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.hcore.util.impl.ContextHelper

  • public class ContextHelper
extends Object
    Static helper class to retrieve the instance of the current SearchIntegrator / ExtendedSearchIntegrator.

    Note:
    The use of this class is discouraged. If possible should FullTextEntityManager.getSearchFactory() be used. However, this is not always possible, for example in FullTextSessionImpl itself.

    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard
